articleData.blog_content:
I came here as an intern, but stayed as a family member.

My journey with desire has been very special. We all have friends in college, some close to us, some acquaintances, but Desire is definitely like a family, where the seniors are like elder siblings always there to guide, fun loving batchmates, who undoubtedly match your level of craziness and the sweetest juniors.

My journey from an intern to a coordinator has indeed been an amazing one. It was fun, exciting but most importantly it came with a huge responsibility. And all this was possible because of the team I'm working with. I have never seen such an enthusiastic bunch of seniors and juniors working together for the same target, envisioned years back.

Desire has given me a lot, an identity, a will to prove my worth and analyse where I stand and where I want to see myself.

It gave me a once in a lifetime opportunity to go to IIM Ahmedabad,that I never even dreamt of, and learn things which I would always remember

I have always been passionate about being of help to the people in need, of being able to serve people with the best I can, and I can say this without a hint of doubt that because of Desire, I definitely am able to look up and be proud of the person i have become.

Desire has given me some of the best days of my college life and I know I will always be a part of this amazing family regardless of where i am. I realised my true potential and for that i will be forever grateful to Desire.
